sentences.en: Good parents sometimes have to spank their children, to teach them right from wrong.
sentences.cn: 好的父母有时不得不打孩子, 以让他们明辨事非.

sentences.en: Good parents sometimes have to spank their children.
sentences.cn: 好父母有时候也不得不通过打孩子来教育他们.

sentences.en: He does it very often. I really get mad. I can't help spank him sometimes.
sentences.cn: 他经常这样做. 我很气愤. 有时候我忍不住打他的屁股.

sentences.en: Her expression is one of shock and arousal, and as she continues to read, he continues to spank.
sentences.cn: 玛吉·吉伦哈尔的表情既吃惊又兴奋，她继续读，詹姆斯·斯派德继续拍打。

sentences.en: I gave him a spank for being so rude.
sentences.cn: 他竟如此无礼,我打了他一巴掌.

sentences.en: I want to treat you rough, throw you around, spank and slap you.
sentences.cn: 我想粗暴对待你, 将你抛来抛去, 打屁股及掌掴你.

sentences.en: I'd spank him and send him to bed without any supper!
sentences.cn: 我要揍他,还不让他吃晚饭就去睡觉!

sentences.en: If I hear any more about monsters, " he said, " I'll spank you. "
sentences.cn: “若是我再听见你们谈论鬼怪, ” 他说, “ 我就打你们屁股. ”

sentences.en: If you are naughty, mother will spank you.
sentences.cn: 你如果淘气, 妈妈就会打你屁股的.

sentences.en: If you're naughty, mother will spank you.
sentences.cn: 你要是调皮, 妈妈会打你屁股的.

sentences.en: It's beyond me to spank him.
Mum: I'd spank him and send him to bed without any supper?
sentences.cn: 妈妈: 我要揍他,还不让他吃晚饭就去睡觉!

sentences.en: Though the Blue Jays didn't spank Chien - Ming Wang in the seventh , they did score three runs.
sentences.cn: 但蓝鸟队却在第七局击败了帮主, 他们在第七局得到三分.

sentences.en: When I used to do that when I was a kid, my mom would spank me.
sentences.cn: 我还是个孩子的时候常常干那种事，每次妈妈总是打我的屁股。

sentences.en: Why did your dad spank you?
sentences.cn: 你老爸为什么打你屁股 呢 ?

words.tran_cn: 疾走者；出众者；船后桅纵帆；极好之物

trans.tran_en: to go at a quick and lively pace
